variable.name: renin
variable.comment: When the lab assay had a negative value data was changed to "0" (n=2). 0 means no Renin activity. The assay result is not a Renin measurement but an activity based on Renin action to produce Angiotensin I, which is what was measured [over a specific time interval and comparing two temperature - one where the enzyme was not active and the other at body temperature to calculate normal Renin activity from the difference]. There were good measurements of angiotensin I in these specimens, but no increase due to Renin activity in the specimen. Version 1 1/4/2010: units and ranges were changed for RENIN.

variable.name: aldo
variable.comment: Lower limit of measurement < 20 was set to 20
